welcome.title: Hello and welcome to my online CV!
paragraphs: I am an Information & Cyber Security student at HSLU, Switzerland, with a focus on Cloud, Mobile, and IoT Security. I am committed to continuously expanding my expertise in cybersecurity and thrive on tackling new challenges. So far, I've mostly focused on defensive concepts, but I would like to expand my knowledge of offensive concepts and techniques as well.
This website is a small project of mine that I've occasionally been working on to help showcase my skills and recent projects. Enjoy!

profile.text: I’m an Information & Cyber Security student at HSLU, Switzerland, specializing in Cloud, Mobile, and IoT security.I enjoy exploring both defensive and offensive techniques.

skills.title: Skills
skills.text: Java, C, HTML, CSS, Python, SQL, JavaScript, Cloud Security, SDNs, etc.

items.label: Bakery Assistant
bullets: July 2024 – Current Date, Zürich
Maintained high standards in product quality, ensuring consistency across all sourdough batches.
Worked closely with the team to meet production goals on time.
Monitored stock levels and managed orders to ensure smooth operations.

items.label: Sales Associate @ Holmes Place AG
bullets: January 2022 – December 2022, Zürich
Consistently achieved membership targets through strategic client engagement.
Maintained accurate records and safeguarded client data in CRM systems.
Assisted members with booking systems, ensuring a seamless user experience.
Enforced studio policies and adhered to industry regulations.
Contributed to promotional campaigns, enhancing studio visibility.

items.label: Physiotherapy Assistant
bullets: May 2020 – July 2020, Ljubljana, Slovenia
Communicated with physicians to provide updates on patient care.
Developed team communications and information for meetings.
Taught patients how to live within limits of capabilities and celebrated successes.
Assisted physiotherapists in patient assessments and treatment planning.
Supported patients during therapy sessions with exercises and demonstrations.

items.label: Sales Associate @ Lush
bullets: May 2019 – September 2019, Ljubljana
Met sales targets, prioritized tasks, worked in a multilingual team.
Supported international clients and maintained store organization.

items.label: CV Website
bullets: As seen on the screen you're currently skimming through :)

items.label: SQL Databank Application
bullets: Designed a database app that calculates exercise needed to burn off calories from fast food.
Used MySQL for data and Metabase for visualization.
Encourages healthier decisions by linking food with physical activity.

items.label: Face Recognition App
items.notepadTitle: Personal Mirror – Android Face Recognition App
bullets: Android app with real-time face detection using OpenCV.
Personalized greetings, calendar notifications, and alarms.
Encrypted local data storage.
Built with Android Studio, Java, and Kotlin.

items.label: Vault7_Analysis.txt
bullets: Analyzed the CIA’s Grasshopper malware framework.
Explored architecture, payload deployment, and obfuscation.

items.label: COBIT_ITIL.txt
items.notepadTitle: COBIT V and ITIL – Security Use Cases
bullets: Studied COBIT V & ITIL frameworks for IT security and risk management.
Analyzed 5 industry case studies.
Offered recommendations for IT governance and incident response.

items.label: ChainOfCustody.txt
bullets: Led a team of 5 researching digital chain of custody practices.
Produced a comprehensive book documenting findings and recommendations.

currentWork.title: What I'm Currently Working On
paragraphs: Since I’m still studying, my areas of interest and projects are constantly evolving and changing. I am currently developing a text-input game in C to expand my knowledge of the programming language. Other programming languages I have worked with are Java, HTML, CSS, Python, SQL, and JavaScript.

Another area I've been focused on, is expanding my knowledge of Cloud Security concepts. To be specific, I'm currently focusing on SDNs and Cloud Infrastructure. Reports and results of various projects and topics I have worked on so far can be downloaded from the "Project" section of this website.

experienceIntro.title: Key Skills from Experience:
bullets: Detail-Oriented: Ensured high standards and accuracy in all tasks.
Effective Communicator: Strong skills in customer interaction and teamwork.
Compliance-Focused: Adhered to regulations and enforced policies consistently.
Problem-Solver: Optimized processes and resolved issues efficiently.
Data Management: Experienced in handling and protecting sensitive information.
